Question: According to Plutarch, this person took flight with her ships at the height of the battle and Antony followed her.
Hints: Although **** was married to her young brother, she quickly made it clear that she had no intention of sharing power with him.
It seems that in reality Antony wanted this person’s promise to support his intended war against the Parthians.
This conflict was one of the main causes of this person's fall from power shortly afterward.
